about_the_game:
Official Mail

thatgoku666@gmail.com
Please contact for game feedback and inquiries.

In Rank Play, you will be matched against other players or their data. The battle steps will be as follows


1. Enter the game, first select initial equipment, which can equip your minions. There are 42 pieces of equipment in the game that give minions a variety of abilities.

2. At the beginning of each battle, you will compete with your opponent for minions or equipment. The ones that are selected will be marked with the selectors. If you want good options, you need to react faster than your opponent.

3. If your reaction is slow, don't worry, you can get the priority attack in the round. In the stage of adjusting the combat position, through strategic position adjustment, you can gain an advantage in the battle.

4. The battle process will be carried out automatically, you can move the mouse to the minion 3D model to know the ability of each minion.

5. At the beginning of the game, 6 races are open: Demon, Undead, Elemental, Magical Creature, Beast, and Human.

6. The same race will have the matching effect on the ability, and it is a good initial choice to gather minions of the same race.

7. Killing enemies can get SkullGold coins, which can be used to increase the value of minions. Therefore, it is an important tactic to put important minions in positions that are easy to kill.

8. If the result of the battle is that no minions of the opponent survive, you win. He will lose one heart, and it will end the game when he loses all hearts.

In Rank Play, you will be matched against other players or their data. The battle steps will be as follows


1. Enter the game, first select initial equipment, which can equip your minions. There are 42 pieces of equipment in the game that give minions a variety of abilities.

2. At the beginning of each battle, you will compete with your opponent for minions or equipment. The ones that are selected will be marked with the selectors. If you want good options, you need to react faster than your opponent.

3. If your reaction is slow, don't worry, you can get the priority attack in the round. In the stage of adjusting the combat position, through strategic position adjustment, you can gain an advantage in the battle.

4. The battle process will be carried out automatically, you can move the mouse to the minion 3D model to know the ability of each minion.

6. The same race will have the matching effect on the ability, and it is a good initial choice to gather minions of the same race.

7. Killing enemies can get SkullGold coins, which can be used to increase the value of minions. Therefore, it is an important tactic to put important minions in positions that are easy to kill.

name: Dungeon Liberator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 (256 MB) or ATI Radeon X1600 Pro (256 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dungeon Liberator is a game mode where eight or two players face off in 1v1 rounds, with the goal to be the last player standing. Players need to compete with opponents for Minions and attack orders. Reaction speed will become as important as tactical ability.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
